description: T1. Ash (rear of Hill Brow) - Climb and dismantle as close to ground level as possible and treat stump to inhibit regrowth 20x11m Tree subsidence to adj building. T3. Cedar (front of Woodleigh) - Remove major deadwood 20mm diameter, raise crown to provide 5m clearance from ground level and reduce encroachment towards building by 1m 18x14m down to 18x13m encroaching on building blocking light in to flats. T4. Scots Pine (front of Woodleigh) - Reduce encroachment towards building by 1m and blend round to create a flat lane building side 18x10m down to 18x9m encroaching on building blocking light in to flats. T5. Sugar Maple (between Hill Brow and Woodleigh) - Crown reduction, reduce the height and spread of the tree by up to 4m and raise crown to provide 5m clearance from ground level. All pruning cuts shall be made to suitable secondary growth points and shall maintain a stable platform for the expected regrowth 20x16m down to 16x12m encroaching on building blocking light in to flats T6. Lime x 3 (front of Highcroft) - Crown Lift to provide 6m clearance from ground level, remove major deadwood greater than 20mm in diameter and crown thin by 10% 18x12m trees works to allow through and under in to adj flats. T7. Acacia (front LHS of Highcroft) - Reduce encroachment towards building by 2m and remove major deadwood greater than 20mm in diameter 16x8m down to 16x6m encroaching on building blocking light in to flats. T8. Acacia x 2 (front of Highcroft) adj to lamp post - Remove major deadwood greater than 20mm diameter and raise crown to provide 5m clearance from ground level 18x10m trees works to clear street lamp.
